payload.name: vector-clocks-causal-consistency
payload.title: Vector clocks + causal consistency: encode partial order, don’t pretend in wall time
payload.formal: vector clocks represent causality; (a \rightarrow b) if all components ≤ and at least one <.
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2 already uses HLC fields, which are a practical compromise between Lamport and wall-clock. Extend causal encoding into work DAGs: parent_work_ids and gate dependencies are explicit causality. Avoid deriving causality from timestamps.
